availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel T. Lee (Logan County, Kentucky, shoemaker)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, shoemaker. North Carolina native. Married to Martha Sattorfield Lee in Warren County, Kentucky, on October 16, 1843. Father of Stephen Lee, Joseph Lee, John Lee, William Lee, James Lee, Delia Lee, Susan Lee, and Samuel M. Lee. Farmer in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Shoemaker in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 379B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 478.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film 000339890, p. 154.
